name: 黃子坤
objective:
講述平面設計之基礎知識，包括造形原理、平面構成、文化與設計美學。
講述平面設計簡史：現代主義、抽象運動、象徵運動、美國設計、後現代主義、電腦與設計的發展。
探討平面設計構成要素：造形的構成要素、內容構成要素。
從實務練習中學習平面設計實務，包括：CIS企業形象識別系統設計、展演活動視覺設計、實務包裝設計以及展覽活動實習為應用項目。 

This course provides an exploration of fundamental principles of graphic design through a series of weekly studio assignments and critiques, supplemented by short readings, class discussions and lectures.
The class aims to develop the ability to skillfully manipulate design elements including type, shape and color, to clearly illustrate meaning and values of graphic work pieces. 
Students read selected materials and meet in seminar discussion groups to review and evaluate the ideas they have studied. The aim is to encourage the student to develop a philosophical direction of graphic design.
